class.desc: A base class for tokens and non-terminals.

var.name: id
var.desc: An array of id integers, which uniquely identifies the symbol.

var.name: startIndex
var.desc: TextIndex at the start of the parsible thing.

var.name: pastIndex
var.desc: TextIndex directly after this parsible thing.

var.name: ctxNode
var.desc: A ref to the file/memory node that contains the stream.
